abstract: German foreign intelligence agent, citing boredom, confesses to transmitting classified information to Central Intelligence Agency in exchange for $102,000.
lead_paragraph: The former spy, a 32-year-old man identified only as Markus R. because of privacy laws, confessed at the opening of his trial in Munich’s state court.

headline.main: Germany: Former Spy Acknowledges Giving Classified Information to C.I.A.
headline.print_headline: Europe; Germany: Former Spy Acknowledges Giving Classified Information to C.I.A.

snippet: The former spy, a 32-year-old man identified only as Markus R. because of privacy laws, confessed at the opening of his trial in Munich’s state court.
